title: Unknown gnosis safe error in the recent deployment code
body: **Describe the bug** A developer has experienced this issue and ask for the help in Discord ``` ├─ [0] VM::serializeAddress(, SafeProxyFactory, 0xa6B71E26C5e0845f74c812102Ca7114b6a896AB2) │ └─ ← **Screenshots** **System Specs:** - Package Version (or commit hash): c150ccd4e141c7c129ae7da501fa8001cc82cbb1 **Additional context** User have tried to implement anything in https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/pull/7449
This liked PR does fix the issue
